wikipedia_page.main: Lee Hardy (born 26 November 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Oldham Athletic and Macclesfield Town and in the Scottish League for Ayr United, St Johnstone and Hamilton Academical. He began his football career as a trainee with Blackburn Rovers, without playing for the first team, and also played non-league football for Hucknall Town and Leigh RMI. He retired from football on medical advice in January 2006, aged 24, after suffering an ankle injury.
